strapiPost.title: Coler Mountain Bike Preserve Wins International Award For Architecture
strapiPost.content:
Coler Mountain Bike Preserve was awarded “Best of Best” in the recreational category by the Architecture MasterPrize. 

  • Another one: Coler was designed by Modus Studio, A Fayetteville based firm that continues to rake in awards for their visionary designs across NWA and beyond. 
  • A symbol: Coler Mountain Bike Preserve was completed in 2020, and has quickly become a defining feature of the mountain biking mecca that is NW Arkansas. 

Read more about the project’s design HERE.
